channel.title: Looking for Codec and Runes
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Looking for Codec and Runes" - Looking for Runes, a Codec, and offers.

item.title: Re: Looking for Codec and Runes
item.content:encoded: i'll give you a rune for those 5 pots and 2 elixirs. pm in game if interested. i actually think a rune is worth more, but whatever.

item.title: Re: Looking for Codec and Runes
item.content:encoded: I'll trade my codec for cure right wounds, if u have it. If not, I'll trade for 2 super potions?

item.title: Looking for Codec and Runes
item.content:encoded:
Looking for Runes, a Codec, and offers.

I have:

5 Super Potions

2 Silver Elixirs

I Would Like:

1. Codec
2. Runes
3. Offers
